entry.title: Cuffing Season
entry.summary:
Author: dd0g90

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,901Chapters: 6/10Kudos: 14

Summary: " Cuffing Season" - The time of year between Halloween and, Valentines Day where adults form a couple to get through the lonely holiday season. Most break up February 15th. Stiles is in his last year of college. He recently lost his job as a waiter at a restaurant and,is barely making ends meat as a delivery driver. He's already delayed his education enough paying for a class at a time. When Lydia suggests an app" Cuffing Season" where rich people pay you to date them during the holidays.Stiles is all ears. What happens when he finds out the three men he is dating are related and, invite him to the same holiday party?

entry.title: A Lonely Wolf Howls
entry.summary:
Author: brianRyanBio

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,145Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 13

Summary: A Teen Wolf Rewrite. This work is an attempt at fixing the things that annoy me about teen wolf and creating an actual timeline. In January of 2011 half of a woman's body is found in the Beacon Hills Preserve. As the Sheriffs department tries to find the second half of her body a series of events is set off changing the course of this small towns future and bringing together a pack of traumatized teenagers. In other words. Derek just wants to find his sisters murderer without Stiles and Scott getting in the way. Stiles wants Scott to admit he's a werewolf and to figure out what is going on. Scott wants to be a normal boy. Allison misses San Francisco and is just trying to fit in. Lydia is clinging to the top of the food chain. And Jackson wants to know where Scott is getting his juice.

entry.title: Road Trip
entry.summary:
Author: brsfic

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,332Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 35

Summary: "Just get a ride home with Derek." First of all, how dare his dad! Because Stiles had reminded his dad‚Äîmultiple times‚Äîto book the damn flight before prices went up, but Sheriff Stilinski forgot, and now Stiles is trapped in Derek Hale‚Äôs self-modified, apocalypse-ready Toyota FJ Cruiser for a twelve-hour drive home in a snowstorm with nothing but mutual hatred and unresolved teenage grudges for company. What starts as a petty road trip filled with aggressive silence, judgmental snack commentary, territorial road navigation, and one deeply inconvenient bathroom emergency slowly tightens into something unbearably tense, something electric. It's the kind of disaster that feels inevitable, the kind where you know things are going to go wrong. And oh‚Äîthey go very, very wrong.

entry.title: Echoes of a Shattered Winter
entry.summary:
Author: am0rawr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,890Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 66

Summary: Ice keeps no memories. But Stiles carries them all.The falls on the cold, unforgiving rink.The voices that whisper even in empty halls.The marks on his body and soul that refuse to fade. He learned early that perfection comes at a price.That silence can be crueler than screams.That every practiced move, every forced smile, is a shield against a world that never stopped judging. Derek Hale is everything he should avoid.Captain of the football team.Popular. Untouchable.A face that sparks rage, defiance, and, against his own will, a strange pull he cannot explain. In Beacon Hills, every glance weighs heavy.Every whisper lingers.And sometimes, it‚Äôs impossible to escape.From the past.From desire.From the shadows that live in your own skin.
